title: It's insane to me that Diamond was so much easier to get than climbing out of silver.
body:
Tl;dr im a toxic bitch and my diamond account is suspended for a few days. I was like "ok ill play on a smurf and reform and HUMBLE myself" but it's just irritated me more because people literally cant handle being carried. They just int, get frustrated int some more. Like there is quite literally no way to 1v5 if your top laner feeds a hyperscale champ and goes 0/7 in 10 minutes and proceeds to say "sorry guys its just a game though hehe :)"
Like holy fuck i had to full mute all just to refrain from typing because it's just THAT TILTING.

It's very hard to not see why low elo players can't climb easily this season. Absolute cancer.

Like nobody cares. It's not getting you any special points and it doesnt somehow make your opinion special. Nobody needs to know what your gender is. >If you actually at all care about female rights and equality. Stop doing this shit because you are a part of the problem... in more ways then just this.

See thats just the thing, im not a part of the problem, im contributing to the solution. When someone calls me a bro or a male variation on my alts, i correct them, and move on. Its very quick, very easy. It also makes me feel good because girls arent often in high elo. I've had several of my peers tell me this.

How many times have you volunteered to work at womens shelters? Mens shelters?? Do you contribute to campus organizations to help protect against sexual assault?

Hey. You are preeeetty toxic. Let me let you in the light. 

You simply CANNOT compare how you are treated irl to how you are treated virtually. I think in a sense, in the virtual world you are treated without gender discrimination because no one knows what gender anyone is. That is, until you bring it up (which is not needed). The reason (up there) why he called you bro is because it shows affection. He doesn't know your gender, and he doesn't have to. He's just responding with bro because that shows affection as a friend. He's just trying to say: good friend, if you lose a silver game, then that is on you. You can't change common definitions, especially when you don't know what they mean. 

The thing about the forums here: most of us are just responding to your texts, not if you are a girl or boy. Now I do get you in the sense that there are players worse in silver elo than diamond (which may not be true due to the amount of boosted/bought accounts). But flaming people in the boards instead of asking why or how you can get better at carrying low elo games. 

Diamond doesn't really mean much. It's just an indication that you have gotten to that rank. Anyone can be just carried along the wave, actually carrying themselves, getting boosted, buying an account. Playing in diamond is different than playing in silver. Maybe you should rely on yourself in low elo, because playing in those 2 elos is different.

Try reforming yourself. I personally was a bad player stuck in gold and silver. I kept on demoting to silver 1 then promoting to gold 4 for at least 10 times before I was able to climb to plat. It's a process. I suggest having an alternative account so you can reclimb those ranks that you climbed on your main, so you can just autopilot and carry those games.

I'm 100% low elo is the absolute hardest shit to deal with if you aren't really good at certain champs and hyper carry all of your games.

I'm not amazing and shit, but fuck my life with being stuck because I just can't do shit in my ranked games when most of my team is still learning champs or the absolute basics and most of the people I'm against play with some degree of skill.  Or at the very least work TOGETHER.  I see teamwork on my side about 1 in 15 games or so.

Its because there are soo many smurfs in Silver the Match making cant make heads nor tails of a game.

When you will have a B1 Smurf, S2 normal, S4 Normal, S3 smurf duo with B1 vs a bunch of S1-3 normals that system trys to figure out what happened.

Next game is mostly S1-3 on both sides but both sides have Smurfs the game thinks this is a normal site up so the next game those smurfs are in the system thinks they are normal players but then you get the first scenario again.

Silver is I would say 30-40% smurfs right now.   It totally screws anyone who is REALLY silver or even Gold trying to get out of silver.

Then you have the smurfs that Duo with Iron trash and they get boosted because the smurf is gaming the system.  So now we have Silver 4-3 players SoloQing that are really Iron trash and the system thinks they were winning so they must be Silver.

What Riot REALLY needs to do is build a Rank system with a Neural Network and have it figure out what are the best stats to track for Rank.  Not just wins/Losses shit.

While there are smurfs, I don't think they are as severe as you suggest.

Most high KDA players I've experienced outside myself.... are just Silver players mistaken for smurfs, because they have a champion that harnesses leads well, have lock CC control, or are a one trick who generally is stuck at low elo because their one trick happens to be a popular pick/ban champion. 

What I really see:

-Supports who don't even take a support item, and instead build {{item:1056}} , arguing that they can get their support item later.

-Supports who don't even complete their quest in 19-30 minutes!

-Top laners who finish a 40 minute game with less than 5 wards.

-Junglers who afk in the jungle until 15-20 minutes into the game, because they avoid XP heavy camps like the plague, and feel behind.

-Mid laners who don't track/pursue opposing mid laners who are active even if it results in losing both top/bot/drakes/heralds, "Because they pinged."

-----------------

Smurfs exploit the crap out of these 5 basic perceptions of low elo. 

They know that supports are horrible pokers at low elo.
They know that many don't even ward.
They know that mids are afk farmers.
They know that junglers don't practice effective jungling.

But...... in many cases..... it's not a smurf, but rather a same elo player realizing these things.

--------------

My opinion? Smurfs control some games. New players control other games. Smurfs control yet others by acting like new players to derank/troll._** But the vast majority are caused by legitimately bad players.**_

I can understand the mid-lane thing.  pursuing any assassin is a fool's errand without vision EVERYWHERE.  Zed, talon, etc will just use the opportunity to crush you

i'm not sure about the "horrible poke" thing...pretty much every support is able to use their abilities often, but maybe some people just spam everything needlessly

as for mids being afk farmers, unless you have a good setup, it only takes a moment of inattention for you to lose a tower, even after plates and especially with jungler aid

This.
Smurfs have existed for a long time, so if they are such a massive issue, why say that now vs much earlier? And this meta? Very harmful to smurfs despite what people think. This account is currently D3 (and likely will remain such until top actually gets some help, I had to climb from d4 0 lp to 100 lp by playing adc mediocre. Pretty much spammed late game ADs like Cait.). I have two other accounts, the one with less games is P1 right now pretty sure, the other got d4 in half the games my main took, but demoted and is currently stuck in limbo. I don't smurf to be a dick to lower rank players, I smurf because the higher level of play is so heavily imbalanced I tilt faster right now than I have in previous seasons (It practically takes one game to full tilt me, unjoyable as hell atm). 

As much as people would like to disagree, this meta for soloqueue is harmful to toplane and heavily benefits mid and adc. It would benefit jg if not for the nerfs upon nerfs it has received.
S9 Smurfs are the issue.   So many Plat+ are hard stuck (because of the LP screw up Riot has made) that they are smurfing to get their fix.

They are smurfing more because no one can climb past d3 without honestly selling their soul to the devil. Shit is so aggrivating of a coinflip. Being toplane especially sucks the most (sure, TFBlade is trying for Global Rank 1, but he plays practically second jg more than being toplane, and spam picks excessive mechanic heavy (Irelia) and questionable but honestly busted (Jax) champs. He practically devotes himself to playing them only). We wouldnt be smurfing so much if the LP gains in Dia+ didnt suck ass. Thats not a us issue, that is a system issue.
